ComicInfo.Summary:
The Swim of Things: A vacationing couple nearly catches Top Dog doing his competitive swimming strokes, but he reverts to the dog paddle just in time.
The Check-Up: Joey takes Top Dog to the veterinarian, and confusion results when they try to keep his intelligence a secret.
Puppy Love: When Lizzie steps on Top Dog, he goes to the corner telephone to call and scold her so that she won't see him talking.
Top Dog vs. Frank 'n' Stein: Mervin orders his mad scientist employees to make Top Dog prefer Mervin to Joey, but Top Dog turns out to be more than they can handle.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-26 16:59:44. [CVDB57381] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 18:15:18. [Issue ID 76183]
ComicInfo.Title: The Swim of Things; The Check-Up; Puppy Love; Top Dog vs. Frank 'n' Stein
